derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from Greek sunodos 'meeting', from sun- 'together' + hodos 'way'

entry.def: A synod is a special council of members of a Church, which meets regularly to discuss religious issues.

means.word_mean: 1. a council convened to discuss ecclesiastical business
